short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pay less for stuff you want from Amazon.com. One place to watch product prices drops, hot deals, compare with Ebay and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily track price changes of products you'd like to buy from Amazon.com. 

+ NO SIGN UP
+ NO EMAILS
+ NO PASSWORDS
+ NO USER TRACKING
+ INSTALLED APP

Just add products, wait for pricedrops and save $$$.
